game.name: Ashes of Immortality
game.categories: Single-player, Full controller support, Steam Trading Cards, Steam Cloud, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: Vampires vs Werewolves vs Hunters... Guess which group you're playing with? Find out in this exciting 16-bit style RPG full of twists and colorful characters!
game.shortDescriptionEn: Vampires vs Werewolves vs Hunters... Guess which group you're playing with? Find out in this exciting 16-bit style RPG full of twists and colorful characters!

reviewHighlights.text: Completed! Frankly, I think it's ok, that is if vampirism is your favorite topic or you're just a fervent fan of Vampire WOD. I encountered a characte...
